Trade/Device Name(s): Sensititre HP MIC Susceptibility Plate Telavancin 0.001-2ug/ml
Sensititre 18-24 hour MIC Susceptibility System Susceptibility Test Panel for Telavancin 0.03-16ug/ml
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Sensititre HP and 18-24 hour susceptibility plates for in vitro antimicrobial susceptibility testing with Telavancin.
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro susceptibility testing of fastidious isolates using Sensititre HP MIC plate and non-fastidious/Gram-positive isolates using Sensititre 18-24 hour MIC panel, with Telavancin dilution ranges.
